p:
Next, the discs were subjected to 1 min of vigorous vortex-shaking in the presence of 0.1% saponine. Subsequently, the obtained suspension was serially diluted and cultured on Columbia Agar plate (in the case of S. aureus) or McConkey Agar plate (in the case of P. aeruginosa). The plates were incubated for 24 h/37 °C. After incubation, the number of colonies grown was counted. The results are shown as % of Biofilm Survival Rate calculated by the formula ( 3):
3

where, CFU EO is a number of CFU survived treatment with specific EO; CFU CP is a number of CFU grown in CP experimental setting. The tests were performed in triplicate.
